title: Last Judgment
summary: The Last Judgment, Final Judgment, Day of Reckoning, Day of Judgment, Judgment Day, Doomsday or The Day of the Lord (Hebrew: יום הדין‎, romanized: Yom ha-din, Arabic: یوم القيامة‎, romanized: Yawm al-qiyāmah, lit. 'Day of Resurrection' or Arabic: یوم الدین‎, romanized: Yawm ad-din, lit. 'Day of Judgement') is part of the Abrahamic religions and in the Frashokereti of Zoroastrianism.
